Title: Login form missing required fields
Description: The login page does not display email and PIN input fields
Expected: Email input and PIN/password input fields visible
Actual: Form fields not detected by standard selectors
Recommended Fix: Verify login form renders correctly; check for conditional rendering issues

Title: Course search returns no results
Description: Searching for known courses returns no results
Actual: Empty results or no search functionality
Recommended Fix: Verify RapidAPI integration; check API key configuration

Title: Score page lacks clear interaction path
Description: Score page does not show clear scoring controls or empty state
Expected: Hole navigation buttons or score input buttons or empty state CTA
Actual: Page content unclear with no obvious next action
Recommended Fix: Add clear empty state with Start Scoring CTA; ensure scoring UI renders when matches exist

Title: Home page shows error on empty data
Description: Home page displays error state instead of helpful empty state when no data exists
Expected: Clear empty state with Create your first trip guidance
Recommended Fix: Add proper empty state component; handle null/undefined data gracefully

Title: Score page shows error on empty data
Description: Score page displays error state instead of helpful empty state when no data exists
Recommended Fix: Add proper empty state component for scoring page

Title: Standings page shows error on empty data
Description: Standings page displays error state instead of helpful empty state when no data exists
Expected: Clear empty state with team standings placeholder
Recommended Fix: Add proper empty state component for standings

Title: Navigation fails when offline
Description: When device goes offline after initial load navigation throws network error
Expected: Service worker serves cached pages or shows offline indicator
Recommended Fix: Verify service worker caching strategy; ensure critical pages are pre-cached

Title: Social page lacks clear features
Description: Social page does not display clear post input or feed content
Expected: Visible post input textarea with feed or empty state
Recommended Fix: Add visible post input textarea; show empty feed state with prompt

Title: Session management lacks lock controls
Description: Session management page does not show lock/unlock controls
Recommended Fix: Ensure lock controls render when sessions exist; add empty state

Title: Schedule page lacks content
Description: Schedule page content unclear with no visible schedule or events
Expected: Schedule display or clear empty state with Add Event prompt
Recommended Fix: Add schedule display or clear empty state

Title: Players page lacks content
Description: Players page does not show player list or clear empty state
Expected: Player directory or Add Player prompt
Recommended Fix: Add player directory or Add Player prompt for empty state

Title: Photo gallery lacks features
Description: Photo gallery page lacks images or upload functionality
Recommended Fix: Add photo upload button; show empty gallery state

Title: Profile creation page visibility
Description: Body element reports as hidden during navigation
Recommended Fix: Investigate profile creation page render lifecycle; check for layout shifts

Title: Slow network performance
Description: App times out on simulated 50kbps connection
Expected: Load with basic UI in under 15 seconds
Recommended Fix: Optimize initial bundle size; implement progressive loading; add skeleton UI
